Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.input

Class ActionPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.input.ActionPool

  • public class ActionPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains a collection of known actions applicable on entities.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ActionPool​()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionPool

        public ActionPool​()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Action get​(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves an action by name.
        Parameters:
        name - action identifier
        Returns:
        action mapped to name, or the NOOP action if no such action

      • put

        public void put​(dev.kkorolyov.simpleprops.Properties actionConfig)
        Parses a configuration file mapping new actions to combinations of known actions. A single configuration entry takes the form ACTION=START_ACTION, HOLD_ACTION, STOP_ACTION. Unknown or empty action names resolve to the NOOP action.
        Parameters:
        actionConfig - action configuration file

      • put

        public void put​(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String start,
                java.lang.String hold,
                java.lang.String stop)
        Adds an action defined by existing known actions to the pool.
        Parameters:
        name - action name
        start - start action identifier
        hold - hold action identifier
        stop - stop action identifier

      • put

        public void put​(Action action)
        Adds an action to the pool. If an action of the same name already exists in the pool, it is replaced with the new action.
        Parameters:
        action - added action

      • parseConfig

        public java.lang.Iterable<KeyAction> parseConfig​(dev.kkorolyov.simpleprops.Properties keyConfig)
        Parses a configuration file defining keys bound to actions maintained by this action pool. A single configuration entry takes the form [KEY1, KEY2, ...]=ACTION, where ACTION is either a single action or a set of 3 actions independently defining start, hold, and stop events. Unknown or empty action names resolve to the NOOP action.
        Parameters:
        keyConfig - key configuration file
        Returns:
        collection of KeyAction objects defined in config
